loginSubtitle: Enter your account details to manage your projects
signUpSubtitle: Make managing your applications simple and fun
agreeTip: Please agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms
passwordStrength: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
forgetPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
emailValidErrorTip: The email format you entered is incorrect
qrcodeSubtitle: Scan the QR code with your phone to login
qrcodePrompt: Click 'Confirm' after scanning to complete login
codeSubtitle: Enter your phone number to start managing your project
mobileErrortip: The phone number format is incorrect
loginAgainSubTitle: Your login session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
checkEmailForResetLink: Please check your email for a password reset link.
chooseSecurePassword: Choose a strong password for your account
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
passwordPattern: Password must contain at least one letter and one number
passwordsDoNotMatch: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
passwordUpdateSuccess: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now sign in with your new password.
passwordUpdateFailedDesc: Failed to update password. Please try again.
unexpectedErrorDesc: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
validEmailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
passwordLengthRequired: Password must be at least 6 characters
resetLinkExpiredDesc: Your password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
emailConfirmationDescription: You'll receive a confirmation email after signing up. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to activate your account.
checkEmailForInstructions: Check your email for password reset instructions
magicLinkInProgress: Magic Link authentication in progress, please wait...
resetLinkExpiredMessage: Reset link has expired. Please request a new password reset email.
resetLinkInvalidMessage: Password reset link is invalid or has expired.
invalidResetLinkMessage: Invalid password reset link. Please request a new one.
passwordRequirementsDescription: Your password must be at least 6 characters long and contain both letters and numbers.
resetLinkSecurityDescription: For security reasons, password reset links expire after a short time. Please request a new link if this one has expired.
magicLinkSubtitle: Enter your email to receive a secure login link
passwordResetDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

errors.invalid_login_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
errors.email_not_confirmed: Please check your email and click the confirmation link to activate your account.
errors.too_many_enrollment_requests: Too many requests. Please wait a moment before trying again.
errors.weak_password: Password should be at least 6 characters and include letters and numbers.
errors.user_already_registered: An account with this email already exists. Please sign in instead.
errors.user_not_found: No account found with this email address.
errors.over_email_send_rate_limit: For security purposes, you can only request this after {seconds} seconds.
errors.over_sms_send_rate_limit: Too many SMS requests. Please wait {seconds} seconds before trying again.
errors.session_not_found: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.refresh_token_not_found: Authentication expired. Please sign in again.
errors.invalid_refresh_token: Session invalid. Please sign in again.
errors.reset_password_not_found: Password reset request not found or expired.
errors.same_password: New password must be different from your current password.
errors.oauth_provider_not_supported: This sign-in method is not available.
errors.external_provider_error: There was an error with the external sign-in service. Please try again.
errors.duplicate_email: An account with this email already exists.
errors.duplicate_phone: An account with this phone number already exists.
errors.captcha_failed: Security verification failed. Please try again.
errors.ip_address_not_authorized: Access not allowed from this location.
errors.network_error: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.internal_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.validation_failed: Please check your input and try again.
errors.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

forgotPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email to receive reset instructions
registerSubtitle: Sign up with your email to get started
magicLinkDescription: Magic links are secure, passwordless login links sent to your email. Simply click the link in your email to sign in instantly!
useMagicLinkInstead: Use Magic Link - No password required
checkEmailForConfirmation: Please check your email for confirmation link.
loginPartiallySuccessfulDesc: Please try refreshing the page or logging in again.
